properties.title: Silvrettahütte SAC
properties.description: The cabin with 100 possibilities: summit ascents, glacier and ski mountaineering tours, climbing routes and col crossings as well as a stopover on manifold round trip hikes. The modern building with its traditional lounge plus the location close to the Silvrettagletscher’s foreland make for an ideal cabin for families and training courses on an extraordinary site. The «Silvretta Gletscherpfad» (Silvretta glacier trail) delivers noteworthy information about the alpine environment.
